Articles.Content: I have lost my email accounts password, and on that account it had my KSP details, because i cant remember my name and password i cant get the game without re-buying it can anyone help?

Welcome to the forums!!

I would suggest trying to contact some of the developers or moderators around here that have access to the store, to try and get your details verified even though you can't access your email account. Apart from that, if you had no backup recovery options on your email account, I cannot think of anything else to help you out.
If you know the e-mail address, you could click the "Forgotten password" link on the log in screen.

Hello Cal!

You can try contacting [\[email protected\]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#496c7e0b26393d2026276c7e0d) about this if you have the receipt still. 

Hope that helps
